title: Thunderbird email account
content:
Hey,

I use thunderbird for email purposes and noticed today that I could not send or receive emails. When I go to compose an email it allows me to type email as usual but there is no send button or option to send when I right click the screen. I got someone to send me an email as a test but I did not receive the email. My email address is ianwil@interlog.com.

Please let me know.

Thanks
creator: ianwil62

title: One of my Gmail accounts inside Thunderbird takes forever
content:
One of my six different Gmail accounts that I have active in Thunderbird takes forever to catch up and load up compared to all the rest ... this has been going on for years

The update bar in the lower right will sit there at halfway through for minutes... .

Attach screenshot please look at the bottom right corner also

Thank you for Anybody's help Craig, Seattle
creator: targetpool

title: Sending .mp4 files with email message
content:
128.6.0esr (64-bit):

Have in the past received occasional e-messages where I needed to go to a file-sharing site to open pix. That is the extent of my understanding of file-sharing, how to file-share my e-message with the .mp4 files attached, etc., etc.

PC here; Windows 10.

So how can I file-share my message with .mp4 attachments?

Thank you. Appreciated.
creator: Hikermann

title: Sending .mp4 files with email message - Round II
content: Failed to inform in the initial message that we're talking six .mp4 files ranging from 26MB to 96MB. Hope this helps.

title: Thunderbird/Ubuntu stops receiving emails from pop yahoo
content:
Hi, 

  Thunderbird on Ubuntu for many years. Started from Ubuntu 20 or so it periodically stops receiving mails from pop yahoo account. Nothing described in community threads helps. It can be for month, two or three, then at some moment it starts receiving emails(nothing changed, even server not restarted, thunderbird keeps hanging not receiving emaiils) and receives for some period(can be couple of days or few weeks). after that it can stop receiving again and it hangs for long.  This situation is for few years for now. last time it stopped receiving emails in mid of December. before this it was working fine for couple of months.   As nothing changes on my side I assume issue is on yahoo?

current release: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS 128.6.0esr (64-bit) 

 When not receiving emails I can see following in error log:

op3.server2.1: NetworkTimeoutError: a Network error occurred Pop3Client.sys.mjs:380:18 

   _onError resource:///modules/Pop3Client.sys.mjs:380

pop3.server2.1: SecurityError info: Pop3Client.sys.mjs:422:20 

   _onError resource:///modules/Pop3Client.sys.mjs:422

​
creator: Filmoscope

title: Invio allegati a mail
content: Salve, quando invio una mail con allegato appare questo messaggio: Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: 1k1Y2E00r33c9ka01k1Ywl Spam Detected. Controllare il messaggio e riprovare. Questo avviene dopo un aggiornamento del programma Thunderbird, cosa posso fare per risolvere il problema che si è verificato dopo un aggiornamento? Grazie
creator: domenico.bogliolo

title: Cambio psw e non ricosce più la psw su Imap Thunderbird
content: Ciao a tutti, ho cambiato le psw dagli account di Thunderbird e adesso non posso più entrare in nessuno perchè si apre una finestra che dice "Inserire la password per .... su imap ....". Come posso risolvere?
creator: ACCOUNT61
